title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: Join Harry on his magical journey to Hogwarts and discover alternate paths in the wizarding world. Make choices that could change the fate of the Boy Who Lived.

characters.name: Selene the Scholar
characters.description: Wise and quick-witted mage with a thirst for knowledge
characters.background: A brilliant witch who excels in ancient magic and spellcrafting

characters.name: Lyra the Enchanter
characters.description: Playful trickster with mastery over illusions
characters.background: A talented sorceress who specializes in enchantments and magical pranks

characters.name: Orin the Battlemage
characters.description: Strong warrior infused with elemental magic
characters.background: A powerful wizard who combines martial prowess with destructive spells

characters.name: Kael the Mystic
characters.description: Quiet wanderer who channels arcane power
characters.background: An enigmatic mage who draws power from ancient mystical sources

checkpoints.title: The Hogwarts Letter
checkpoints.context: Harry receives his Hogwarts letter on his 11th birthday
checkpoints.sceneDescription: The Dursleys have taken Harry to a hut on a rock in the sea to escape the letters, but Hagrid arrives at midnight.

male_wizard_1.text: Ask Hagrid about his parents immediately
Focus on learning about the wizarding world first
Express anger at the Dursleys for lying

checkpoints.title: Diagon Alley Shopping
checkpoints.context: Harry visits Diagon Alley to buy his school supplies
checkpoints.sceneDescription: Harry is overwhelmed by the magical world and must make choices about his purchases and interactions.

male_wizard_1.text: Spend extra time in Ollivanders learning about wands

checkpoints.title: The Sorting Hat
checkpoints.context: Harry faces the Sorting Hat at Hogwarts
checkpoints.sceneDescription: The Sorting Hat considers placing Harry in Slytherin, but Harry can influence this decision.

male_wizard_1.text: Ask to be placed where he's most needed

baseScript: The original story follows Harry Potter as he discovers he's a wizard and begins his education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry...
